title: Unable to spectate friends
body: So I am unable to spectate my friend's games. I just get a screen with reconnect and quit, hit reconnect over and over and nothing. Did a fresh re-install and full repairs twice. Any ideas?

replies.body:
The way that the reconnect screen keeps popping up makes me think that your network might be having a hard time getting connected to their game, but there's also a chance that the game had already ended but is still showing that your friend is in the match for some reason. 

Let's first make sure that your network can get a strong connection to those game servers first by checking up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). If those steps don't seem to help much, hit me back up and we can dig a little further with you!
